page_content:
7      SYNEOS HEALTH SUSTAINABILITY SNAPSHOT
We are socially conscious of our impact on the environment and believe in doing more than just “what’s required.” As we built Syneos Health, we 
embedded our belief in the importance of building sustainable business practices in everything we do. We’re committed to reducing our impact 
on the physical environment via our carbon footprint, enhanced recycling programs and reduced energy usage. With this in mind, we have and 
continue to introduce and maintain various environmental programs with sustainable benefits.Strengthening Our Planet
Committed to Building a Sustainable Business
Our sustainability efforts are focused on three areas where we can deliver the highest impact when it comes to protecting the environment.  
Given the majority of our Company’s office space is leased, we work closely with leasing agents, landlords and suppliers throughout the leasing  
life cycle on these priority areas: energy conservation, waste management and green construction .SUSTAINABILITY HIGHLIGHTS
